text.p: Does [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] respect vector addition? That is, is [mathjaxinline]T(\mathbf{v}+ \mathbf{w}) = T(\mathbf{v}) + T(\mathbf{w})[/mathjaxinline] for all vectors [mathjaxinline]\mathbf{v},\mathbf{w}[/mathjaxinline]? Try a couple of specific numerical examples if you're not sure.

Does [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] respect scalar multiplication? That is, is [mathjaxinline]T(a\mathbf{v}) = aT(\mathbf{v})[/mathjaxinline] for all vectors [mathjaxinline]\mathbf{v}[/mathjaxinline] and scalars [mathjaxinline]a[/mathjaxinline]? Try a couple of specific numerical examples if you're not sure.
